mapper.select: select no, user_no, postList_no, DATE_FORMAT( date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as date, content from comment where no = #{no}

select u.name as `user_name`, u.picture as `user_picture`, c.no as `comment_no`, c.user_no as `user_no`, DATE_FORMAT( c.date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) as `date`, c.content as `content` from comment c, user u where postList_no = #{postList_no} and c.user_no = u.no;
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content}, date=now() where no=#{no}
